text: Atish Raj ( , also spelled, Aatish Raj), was an industrial and avant-garde Pakistani rock band formed and fronted by Pakistani music journalist and writer, Nadeem F. Paracha. == Relaunch == In a recent development Paracha was approached by Zeeshan Pervez, leader of Sajid & Zeeshan, for the remixing of an Atish Raj song, "War in Heaven." The song was relaunched in February 2007.http://nadeemfparacha.googlepages.com/warinheaven == See also == * List of Pakistani music bands ==References== Category:Pakistani musical groups Category:Pakistani rock music groups Category:Musical groups established in 1994 Category:1994 establishments in Pakistan
title: Atish Raj
